description: A ReplicaSet ensures that a specified number of pod replicas are running at any given time.

apiVersion.description: apiVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

metadata.description: Standard object's metadata. If the Labels of a ReplicaSet are empty, they are defaulted to be the same as the Pod(s) that the ReplicaSet manages.

spec.description: The specification of the desired behavior of the ReplicaSet.
